= genome_seq =

== Format ==
cg sam_clipamplicons ampliconsfile file outfile

== Summary ==
Clip primers from aligned sequences in a sam file (by changing bases to N and quality to 0) given a set of target amplicons

== Description ==

== Arguments ==
; **ampliconsfile**: tab delimited file containing targets with at least following columns: chromosome begin end
; **file**: directory containing reference genomes and variation data
; **outfile**: directory containing reference genomes and variation data

== Category ==
Processing
